# Fetch Familiar Friends ğŸ¾

> Building the future of pet social networking with Pokemon GO-style gameplay

Welcome to the Fetch Familiar Friends organization! We're creating a comprehensive pet social health hub that combines location-based discovery, AR gameplay, virtual pets, professional coaching, and telemedicine.

## ğŸŒŸ What We're Building

**Fetch Familiar Friends** is more than just a pet calendar appâ€”it's a complete social ecosystem for pet owners featuring:

- ğŸ—ºï¸ **Location-Based Discovery** - Find fellow pet parents at parks, beaches, and trails
- ğŸ® **Pokemon GO-Style Gameplay** - Quests, gyms, season passes, and PvP battles
- ğŸ“¸ **AR Features** - AR camera, virtual pets, and interactive games
- ğŸ‹ï¸ **Professional Coaching** - Monthly featured coaches and location-based gym challenges
- ğŸ¥ **24/7 Telemedicine** - Veterinary nurse practitioners on demand
- ğŸ’« **Virtual Companions** - Tamagotchi-style virtual pets synced with real-world activities
- ğŸŒˆ **Memorial Services** - Full pet virtualization with voice recreation and life timelines
- ğŸ“š **Daily Story Books** - Daily content that builds into monthly story books
- ğŸ‘‘ **3-Tier Subscriptions** - Free, Premium Digital, and Luxury Analog options

## ğŸ¤ Get Involved

We welcome contributions from developers, designers, pet lovers, and anyone passionate about improving pet care!

### Ways to Contribute

- ğŸ’» **Code Contributions** - Check out our [good first issues](https://github.com/ivi374forivi/fetch-familiar-friends/labels/good%20first%20issue)
- ğŸ“ **Documentation** - Help improve our guides and docs
- ğŸ› **Bug Reports** - Found a bug? [Report it](https://github.com/ivi374forivi/fetch-familiar-friends/issues/new/choose)
- ğŸ’¡ **Feature Ideas** - Share your ideas in [Discussions](https://github.com/ivi374forivi/fetch-familiar-friends/discussions)
- ğŸ¨ **Design** - Contribute UI/UX improvements
- ğŸ§ª **Testing** - Help test new features

### Quick Start for Contributors

```bash
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/ivi374forivi/fetch-familiar-friends.git

# Install dependencies
cd fetch-familiar-friends
npm install

# Start development server
npm run dev
```

See our [Contributing Guide](https://github.com/ivi374forivi/fetch-familiar-friends/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md) for detailed instructions.

## ğŸ—ï¸ Tech Stack

- **Frontend:** React 18, Vite, Tailwind CSS
- **Animation:** Framer Motion
- **Deployment:** GitHub Pages
- **CI/CD:** GitHub Actions
- **Package Manager:** npm

## ğŸ“ˆ Roadmap Highlights

### v0.3.0 - Social Expansion
- Enhanced friend system with leveling
- Location-based discovery improvements
- Care instruction sharing

### v0.4.0 - Gameplay & AR
- Season pass system
- Gym battles and challenges
- AR camera enhancements

### v0.5.0 - Premium Services
- Subscription tier implementation
- Monthly story book system
- Professional coaching platform

### v1.0.0 - Full Launch
- Complete platform integration
- Mobile app release
- Advanced telemedicine features
